assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The authors declare no competing interests.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: This study was performed in line with the principles of the Declaration of Helsinki. The study was approved by the Ethics Committee of the Cukurova University Faculty of Medicine (Approval no: 82 Nov 2, 2018) and by the institutional review board of the University of Mississippi Medical Center (Approval no: 2017-0238, Jan 27, 2018).

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: All individuals and/or their legal guardians provided written informed consent.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The functional studies data that support the findings of this study are available on reasonable request from the corresponding author. The significant genetics variant data that support the findings of this study will be available in a public database, ClinVar. The raw human genetics data are not publicly available due to consent form restrictions.
